channel.title: Free veng

item.title: Free veng
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

…

if(playerIsMember == 1) means that it will only work if you’re a member.

if(playerIsMember == 0)
sendMessage(“You have to be a member to use vengeance!”);

Is just sending a message, not actually stopping you from doing it.

Of course, you’d want to remove that.
Otherwise it’d be stupid.

Understand ?

Read full topic

item.title: Free veng
item.dc:creator: @xRedemptionx xRedemptionx
item.description:
@xRedemptionx wrote:

[quote=“x0 0wn, post:4, topic:194796”]Just delete membership all together.
Gah.

And no.

Also, so you can see it obviously…

if(playerIsMember == 0)
sendMessage(“You have to be a member to use vengeance!”);

Was the thing making it member only.

No, if(playerIsMember == 1) was.[/quote]

Why the hell does it sendmessage you need to be a member then?

Read full topic

item.title: Free veng
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Replace with this:

case 162: { if(actionTimer == 0){ { actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(401, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Free veng
item.dc:creator: @bxexnxnxextt bxexnxnxextt
item.description:
@bxexnxnxextt wrote:

this is my veng code on emote tab:

case 162: { if(playerIsMember == 1) if(actionTimer == 0){ { actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(401, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } } if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("You have to be a member to use vengeance!"); break;

What do i edit to make for reg players and not only members? please edit and post code if you know =D.

help appreciated =o!

-bxexnxnxextt

Read full topic
